meanings.definition: The state or quality of being overdominant.
meanings.sent1: Her overdominances in the group project made it hard for others to share their ideas.
meanings.sent2: The team's overdominances in the game led to their victory.
meanings.sent3: His overdominances in the game of chess were both impressive and intimidating.
meanings.sent4: The overdominances of the sun in the sky cast a bright light over the entire field.
meanings.sent5: The overdominances of the waterfall's roar could be heard from miles away.

meanings.definition: An instance of being excessively dominant.
meanings.sent1: The overdominances of the bully made the other students feel scared.
meanings.sent2: The overdominances of the storm caused widespread damage to the town.
meanings.sent3: The overdominances of the toddler over the playground toys caused a commotion.
meanings.sent4: The overdominances of the queen bee kept the hive in order.
meanings.sent5: The overdominances of the lion in the jungle made it the king of the animals.
